en.descripcionSpringBoot: Development of a RESTful API for resource management using Spring Boot. Includes JWT authentication and local database connection.
en.descripcionFullStack: Full stack web application with React on the frontend and Node.js on the backend. Includes local database.

en.descripcionPersonal: I am Franco Recalde, a passionate 20-year-old student in my fourth year of Systems Engineering at UTN FRC. My fascination with technology drives me to stay updated with the latest trends and tools in the field. I enjoy tackling new challenges and expanding my knowledge. My goal is to grow as a professional and contribute to the world of technology with projects that generate a positive impact.
